author: Simon Difford
description: Created by Roberto Berdecia for Patrón Tequila at London Cocktail Week 2016.Roberto is a co-founder of La Factoría, in San Juan, Puerto Rico.
name: Mercado Roma

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice)
Blend equal parts pineapple juice and sugar and leave to rest for 2 hours
Add equal parts white wine vinegar and leave for 24 hours
Then add a teaspoon of chipotle sauce and blend
Add equal parts honey, water and a handful of cloves to a pot and heat at 180˚C for 25 minutes stirring constantly
